title: IAlarmHandler (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE IAlarmHandler
The generated function blocks for the alarm configurations register
themselves at an instance of this interface
Methods:
AcknowledgeAll
AcknowledgeAllOfGroup
AcknowledgeOneOfGroup
RaiseEvent
Structure:
AcknowledgeAll (Method)
AcknowledgeAllOfGroup (Method)
AcknowledgeOneOfGroup (Method)
RaiseEvent (Method)
